text:
="preserve">Manuel Costas Sanromán (8 May 1942 – 15 December 2020) was a Spanish professional footballer. He played as a defender. Costas was born in Panxón, Spain. He played for Sevilla FC from 1963 to 1974. He also played for Recreativo de Huelva from 1964 to 1965.
Costas died on 15 December 2020, aged 78.
